snippet: Lawyers made closing arguments Thursday in the case of Msgr. William J. Lynn, the clergy secretary who is accused of shielding predatory priests and exposing children to sexual abuse.
abstract: Defense and prosecution make their closing arguments in the landmark sexual-abuse trial of Msgr William J Lynn, who stands accused of shielding predatory priests and exposing children to sexual abuse.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers made closing arguments Thursday in the case of Msgr. William J. Lynn, the clergy secretary who is accused of shielding predatory priests and exposing children to sexual abuse.

headline.seo: Closing Arguments for Msgr. Lynn in Philadelphia Sex-Abuse Case
headline.main: Cases Close for Philadelphia Diocese Official
headline.print_headline: Jury to Get Case of Official At Diocese In Philadelphia
